code: @Test public void testFtpRoute() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint resultEndpoint = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     resultEndpoint.expectedBodiesReceived(expectedBody).     template.sendBodyAndHeader(getFtpUrl(), expectedBody, "cheese", 123).     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied(). }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from(getFtpUrl()).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
